title: Level 1: Perception
description: Perfect for STRANGERS. Test your first impressions and break the ice. What do you think you know about each other?

cards.content: Do I seem like a coffee or a tea person?
What was your very first thought when you saw me?
Do I look like I was popular in high school?
What does my style say about me?
Do I seem more like an introvert or an extrovert?
cards.back: Ask me which one I actually am.

cards.content: WILDCARD
cards.back: Make eye contact for 30 seconds. No talking.

cards.content: Do I look like I am always early or always late?
What reality show do I look like I would win?
Do I seem like a morning person or a night owl?
What is the first thing you noticed about me?
Do I look like I have a good relationship with my parents?
cards.back: This is a guess based on vibe.

cards.content: Do I seem like a cat person or a dog person?
What kind of music do I look like I listen to?
cards.back: Check my Spotify/Apple Music to verify.

cards.content: Do I seem like someone who follows the rules or breaks them?
What do you think is my go-to alcoholic drink?
cards.back: If I don't drink, guess my soda order.

cards.content: WILDCARD
cards.back: Ask me any question. I must answer.

cards.content: Do I look like I've ever been in a fistfight?
What career do I look like I should have?
Do I seem like the jealous type?
Do I look like I text back immediately or days later?
What is one thing you are curious about regarding me?
Do I seem optimistic or realistic?
Do I look like I cook or order takeout?
What part of my personality stands out the most so far?
Do I seem like a heartbreaker or the heartbroken?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Thumb wrestle. Winner asks a follow-up question.

cards.content: Do I seem like I save money or spend it?
Where do I look like I grew up?
Do I look like I have a lot of secrets?
Do I seem approachable or intimidating?
What compliment do you think I hear the most?
Do I seem like a reader or a watcher?
What color describes my energy?
Do I look like I hold grudges?
Do I look like I believe in aliens?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Show me the third photo in your camera roll.

cards.content: Do I seem like I make decisions with my head or my heart?
What do you think is my biggest fear?
Do I look like I am happy right now?
Who do I remind you of?
Do I look like I exercise?
What vibe do I give off?
Do I seem like I have siblings?
Do I look like I've ever been arrested?
What subject do I look like I failed in school?
WILDCARD
cards.back: Draw a quick portrait of me on a napkin/paper (or phone).

cards.content: Do I seem like a hugger?
What do you think my superpower is?
Do I look like I snore?
Based on first impressions, would you trust me with a secret?
Do I look like I like spicy food?
Do I seem like I played sports in high school?
What Disney character do I remind you of?
Do I seem like I believe in ghosts?
What kind of car do I look like I drive?
Do I look like I have a messy or clean room?
Do I seem more logical or emotional?
Do I look like I'm good at keeping secrets?
What genre of movie do I look like I hate?
Do I seem like I have a tattoo?
